name: places/ChIJB0L7GlhYwokRxkI5aV47F6U
formattedAddress: 931 8th Ave NW corner of 55th & 8th, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 931 8th Ave NW corner of 55th & 8th, New York, NY 10019, USA

editorialSummary.text: Chain with a wide range of nutritional supplements, vitamins & herbs, plus bath & beauty products.

originalText.text:
I don’t normally write reviews but I had such a terrible experience in this place. Last week, I dealt with a very rude associate— I believe his name was Jeffery. I was looking for some information on supplements and requested his recommendations. Instead of helping me, he started hitting on me and even asked for my number. When I declined his advances he became belligerent. I tried to steer the conversation back to the supplements. Jeffery was incredibly unhelpful, did not want to answer my questions. He did not try to find the answers if he wasn’t sure nor did he bring me to someone who could help. Instead, he dismissed me, kept walking away without at least handing me off to another coworker, continued to just talk to his coworker as if i was not there and was overall nasty. He said I was harassing him when all I was asking was if he could offer recommendations, something most stores should be able to offer. Navigating the vitamins and supplements is difficult enough and he made it even more nerve wracking because of his lack of assistance.

Not once did he even try to be polite and courteous. Management needs to have a serious conversation with him and should take disciplinary actions. You need to train better customer service with this employee.

originalText.text: Nice place, a bit confuse but OK. Staff is welcome.

text.text: Nice place, a bit confuse but OK. Staff is welcome.

originalText.text: Not only is this location my neighborhood Vitamin Shoppe, it’s one of my favorites. I never caught the associates name but there is a lady who is always there and she truly never steers me wrong. I always feel at ease knowing she’s there to help assist and guide me on alternative options of overall opinions of products. If this location is slightly out of your way, make the trek! You won’t be disappointed.

originalText.text:
I had a great time shopping here. I discussed with the male associate all my concerns and things I was looking for. He was very patient, offered advice, recommendations and solutions and overall he was very charming and likeable. I'm sure their other staff is great, but this review isn't about them right now.

Finally, the location was very clean and had a diverse number of alternatives between their products.

originalText.text: I am a member of Vitamin Shoppe for 30 years. And still happy with it. Products and staff come and gone but the quality of service still at best. Staff are friendly and helpful so don't be afraid to ask questions. They quite knowledgeable  with there products.
